description:
We want to share with you the Burbowl project, a Wordpress web solution with different sections such as: Menu, locations, franchise information, blog and contacts. It also has integration with delivery platforms.
Located in Downtown Miami and Coral Gables, BurBowl is a fast-food restaurant that stands out from the ordinary. Unique dishes, fresh ingredients and located in two of the best areas of Miami city. Since January 2016, we have been taking their digital media to the next level.
